title: Amphitryon, or, The two Sosia's a comedy, as it is acted at the Theatre Royal / written by Mr. Dryden ; to which is added the musick of the songs, compos'd by Mr. Henry Purcel.
author: Dryden, John, 1631-1700.
publisher: Printed for J. Tonson ... and M. Tonson ...,
notes: The songs (13 p. at end) have special t.p. with title: The songs in Amphitryon, with the musick composed by Mr. Henry Purcell. London : Printed by J. Heptinstall for Jacob Tonson ..., 1690.
First published in 1690 with subtitle: The two Socia's.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
